debug.createJSONScript: Creating a script element to load JSON lib.
debug.originNotWhitelisted: origin ' + evt.origin + ' is not whitelisted! Halting message processing.
debug.settingRemoteOriginParent: READY! From origin: ' + evt.origin + '. Posting back to child...
debug.remoteOriginSet: remoteOrigin is set! Process the endpoint: ' + endpoint + '
debug.errorParsingMessage: ERROR! Parent could not parse message: ' + evt.data + '
debug.settingRemoteOriginChild: remoteOrigin set to: ' + remoteOrigin + '. Removing listener.
debug.cachedDataAvailable: There was cachedData available. Send it to parent.
debug.stripSubdomain: FAIL. Try stripping subdomain and setting again...
debug.giveUpSubdomain: FAIL. Give up and do postMessage.
debug.usePostMessage: No endpoint set. Resort to postMessage. Listening for handshake.
debug.sendUseNamespace: ...and since an endpoint was successfully set, use it.
debug.endpointMissing: ERROR! Could not find endpoint: ' + endpoint + '
